overrides.name: Champion of Corruption
Abilities: Blight Aura (creatures within 10’ must save vs Fort DC 12 or suffer -1 to all rolls for 1 turn)
Consume Flesh (once per combat, heals 1d6 HP after slaying a foe)
Voice of the Ruin (once per combat, force all within 30’ to save Will DC 13 or be shaken, -2 to actions for 1 round)

overrides.name: Gnoll Warlord of the Tomb
Abilities: Tactical Howl (allied gnolls gain +1 to attack for 1 round)
Chaos Surge (once per battle, release a wave of chaotic energy: 2d6 damage in 15’, Will DC 13 half)
Unnatural Discipline (all gnoll allies fight with eerie precision and morale, unlike their kin)
